trans-unit.source: Implements a markup extension that describes the location of the binding source relative to the position of the binding target.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer filtypen markup som beskriver plasseringen for datakilden for binding i forhold til målet binding.

trans-unit.source: One of the ways to specify a binding source is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: En metoder for å angi en binding kilde er å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is the property type of that property.
trans-unit.target: Dette er egenskapstypen for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: RelativeSource is simultaneously a markup extension implementation and a data object.
trans-unit.target: RelativeSource er samtidig en markup utvidelsen implementering og et dataobjekt.

trans-unit.source: When the extension returns itself (see <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.ProvideValue%2A>), the relevant information is contained in the data.
trans-unit.target: Når utvidelsen returnerer seg selv (se <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.ProvideValue%2A>), relevant informasjon finnes i dataene.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.ProvideValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The main purpose of the markup extension is to allow a variable-argument constructor syntax in attribute form, so that the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> mode can be defined inline with the two extra arguments for ancestor type and level that the other modes do not require.
trans-unit.target: Primære formålet markup utvidelsen er å gi en variabel-argument-konstruktøren syntaks i attributtet skjemaet slik at den <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>modus kan være definert som innebygd med to ekstra argumenter for overordnet type og nivået som ikke krever de andre modiene.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informasjon, se [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: ## XAML teksten Bruk

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> class with an initial mode.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"> </xref> klassen med en opprinnelig modus.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> class with an initial mode and additional tree-walking qualifiers for finding the desired relative source.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"> </xref> klassen med en opprinnelig modus og ekstra tre går kvalifikatorer for å finne den ønskede relativ kilden.

trans-unit.source: `ancestorType` and `ancestorLevel` have no relevance if given as parameters for a `mode` other than <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>.
trans-unit.target: `ancestorType`og `ancestorLevel` har ingen funksjon hvis angitt som parametere for en `mode` enn <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>

trans-unit.source: Do not use this signature for the other <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> values.
trans-unit.target: Ikke Bruk denne signaturen for den andre <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>verdier.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: For this signature to be relevant, this should be <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dette skal være for denne signaturen være relevante <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of ancestor to look for.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>av overordnet skal se setningen for.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The ordinal position of the desired ancestor among all ancestors of the given type.
trans-unit.target: Ordenstallet posisjonen til det ønskede overordnet blant alle overordnede for den angitte typen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level of ancestor to look for, in <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"></xref> mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor mange overordnet du leter etter, i <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"> </xref> modus.

trans-unit.source: Use 1 to indicate the one nearest to the binding target element.
trans-unit.target: Bruk 1 for å angi den nærmest bindingen target-element.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property is not set explicitly, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> or the AncestorLevel property will implicitly lock the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property value to <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt eksplisitt, endring av <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A>eller egenskapen AncestorLevel låser implisitt <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A>egenskapsverdien til <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ## XAML tekst-Bruk For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informasjon, se [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The ancestor level.
trans-unit.target: Overordnet nivå.

trans-unit.source: Use 1 to indicate the one nearest to the binding target element.
trans-unit.target: Bruk 1 for å angi den nærmest bindingen target-element.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of ancestor to look for.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir typen overordnet skal søkes etter.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property is not set explicitly, setting the AncestorType or the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A> property will implicitly lock the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property value to <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A>egenskapen ikke er angitt eksplisitt, angir du AncestorType eller <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A>egenskapen låser implisitt <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A>egenskapsverdien til <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ## XAML tekst-Bruk For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informasjon, se [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The type of ancestor.
trans-unit.target: Typen overordnet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> is not in the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"></xref> mode.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"> </xref> er ikke i den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"> </xref> modus.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"></xref> value that describes the location of the binding source relative to the position of the binding target.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"> </xref> verdi som beskriver plasseringen for datakilden for binding i forhold til målet binding.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only after initialization.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet etter initialisering.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set explicitly, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A> properties will implicitly lock this property value to <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen ikke er angitt eksplisitt, endring av <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A>egenskapene låser implisitt verdien for denne egenskapen til <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ## XAML tekst-Bruk For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informasjon, se [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is immutable after initialization.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er uforanderlig etter initialisering.

trans-unit.source: Instead of changing the Mode on this instance, create a new <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> or use a different static instance.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å endre modus for denne forekomsten, oppretter du en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"> </xref> eller bruk en annen statisk forekomst.

trans-unit.source: Gets a static value that is used to return a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> constructed for the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"></xref> mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en statisk verdi som brukes til å returnere en <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"> </xref> konstruert den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"> </xref> modus.

trans-unit.source: Three of the four <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> values, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>, can produce a <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> that is wholly static, containing no unique private values.
trans-unit.target: Tre av fire <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>verdier, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>, får du et <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>som er helt statisk, som inneholder ingen privat unike verdier.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>

trans-unit.source: All uses of the static property can share the same object, eliminating the need to allocate separate objects for each use.
trans-unit.target: Alle bruker for egenskapen statisk kan dele det samme objektet, ikke nødvendig å tildele separate objekter til hver enkelt bruker.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using the static property reduces memory usage.
trans-unit.target: Derfor reduserer ved hjelp av statiske egenskapen minnebruk.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ## XAML tekst-Bruk For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informasjon, se [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A static <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A static <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that should be set as the value on the target object's property for this markup extension.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et objekt som skal angis som verdien for egenskapen i målobjektet for denne filtypen markup.

trans-unit.source: For <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>, this is another <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>, using the appropriate source for the specified mode.
trans-unit.target: For <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"> </xref>, dette er en annen <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"> </xref>, ved hjelp av den riktige kilden for den angitte modusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> is simultaneously a markup extension implementation and a data object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>er samtidig en markup utvidelsen implementering og et dataobjekt.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>

trans-unit.source: When the extension returns itself, the relevant information is contained in the data.
trans-unit.target: Låse utvidelsen seg selv, finnes relevant informasjon i dataene.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose of the markup extension is to allow a variable-argument constructor syntax in attribute form so that the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> mode can be defined inline, with the two extra arguments for ancestor type and level that the other modes do not require.
trans-unit.target: Primære formålet markup utvidelsen er å gi en variabel-argument-konstruktøren syntaks i attributtet skjemaet slik at den <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>modus kan være definert som innebygd med de to ekstra argumentene for overordnet type og nivået som ikke krever de andre modiene.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>

trans-unit.source: An object that can provide services for the markup extension.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som kan gi tjenester for markup filtypen.

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren kan være i denne implementeringen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Another <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Another <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a static value that is used to return a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref> constructed for the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"></xref> mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en statisk verdi som brukes til å returnere en <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"> </xref> konstruert den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode"> </xref> modus.

trans-unit.source: Three of the four <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> values, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>, can produce a <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> that is wholly static, containing no unique private values.
trans-unit.target: Tre av fire <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>verdier, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>, får du et <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>som er helt statisk, som inneholder ingen privat unike verdier.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>

trans-unit.source: All uses of the static property can share the same object, eliminating the need to allocate separate objects for each use.
trans-unit.target: Alle bruker for egenskapen statisk kan dele det samme objektet, ikke nødvendig å tildele separate objekter til hver enkelt bruker.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using the static property reduces memory usage.
trans-unit.target: Derfor reduserer ved hjelp av statiske egenskapen minnebruk.

trans-unit.source: A static <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A static <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel*> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel*>egenskapen skal beholdes.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel*>

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: Dette `ShouldSerialize` metoden leveres fordi den <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A>egenskapen har ikke en enkel standardverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden angir om egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien.

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>.
trans-unit.target: Du vanligvis starter denne metoden hvis du enten utvikler en utformer for <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>eller utvikler din egen kontrollere implementert <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis egenskapsverdien er endret fra standard. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType*> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType*>egenskapen skal beholdes.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType*>

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: Dette `ShouldSerialize` metoden leveres fordi den <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A>egenskapen har ikke en enkel standardverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden angir om egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien.

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>.
trans-unit.target: Du vanligvis starter denne metoden hvis du enten utvikler en utformer for <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>eller utvikler din egen kontrollere implementert <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> </xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Defining Default Values with the ShouldSerialize and Reset Methods](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [definerer standardverdier med ShouldSerialize og tilbakestille metodene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis egenskapsverdien er endret fra standard. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Verdien støtter det [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: A static <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A static <xref href="System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource"></xref>.
